abstract: A new Visa promotion is centered on a sweepstakes that offers a lucky Visa cardholder a chance to attend Super Bowl XLVI in Indianapolis on Feb. 5 with 10 of his or her family and friends.
snippet: A new Visa promotion is centered on a sweepstakes that offers a lucky Visa cardholder a chance to attend Super Bowl XLVI in Indianapolis on Feb. 5 with 10 of his or her family and friends.
lead_paragraph: There are not too many familiar fictional characters named Ned, with the possible exception of Ned Ryerson, the insurance salesman from the movie “Groundhog Day.” Visa is hoping to change that with an extensive campaign for the 2011-12 version of its annual National Football League sponsorship promotion.

headline.main: In New Visa Campaign, Ned Is the Man
